clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.contai.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.containers.OutOfBounds
Checks for index out-of-bounds when using ‘CFArray’ API.
The
clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.containers.OutOfBounds
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-osx.coreFoundation.contai.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
